column4: 9 a.m. to 12 p.m. - Three lanes inbound and one lane outbound.
12 p.m. to 2:30 p.m. - Normal lane configuration.
2:30 p.m. to 5:30 p.m. - Three lanes outbound and one lane inbound.

column3: Alumni Dr between Tates Creek Rd and Kroger Field:
column4: Alumni Dr is ONE WAY to the stadium.
The outbound left turn lane to Alumni Dr is closed.
